name: Solitaire (itch) (ezez33)
description:
--- SOLITAIRE ---

A traditional single player card game - in this case, similar to the old Windows Klondike Solitaire.

If you are not familiar with Klondike Solitaire game rules, you can google Solitaire game rules.

Use full screen for a better experience.

=== GAMEPLAY / WINNING THE GAME ===

There are no predefined games, cards are in random order so it is possible to get unsolvable games. If you think you are stuck, press F9 to restart.

While the game doesn't detect unsolvable state, it automatically detects solved game state and suggests you to press S to automatically move cards to foundation stacks. At this point, you have "won" the game.

=== CONTROLS ===

Move cards - Mouse left click and drag
Restart game - F9
Undo move - U key

=== INFO ===

Programming and design by Sami S.

I created this game as a learning experience.

Playing card images sourced from Wikimedia Commons.
